properties.name: toolbar
properties.summary: A Toolbar instance to use as a toolbar.
properties.description:
Allows using a [Toolbar]Titanium.UI.Toolbar as a toolbar in the DrawerLayout, exposing [Toolbar's]Titanium.UI.Toolbar properties and methods for a further customization.

This Toolbar instance is automatically set to be used as a default ActionBar.

properties.name: toolbarEnabled
properties.summary: Determine whether to enable the toolbar.
properties.description: This property is ignored if the used theme provides a default ActionBar.
